text: Agelak agak, God gek seŋ amnɨgab agɨl, gos kɨles gɨl ma nepɨm ak nɨm anɨgup agak. Pen yad nɨbop nɨŋɨd agebin agak. Gos nɨbi ak mab mastet mɨdup sɨkol mɨdeb tek nɨgenɨgabɨm, dum awl lɨg sɨŋadaŋ amnoŋ agem, God gek amnɨgab agak. Pen nɨg wos gɨnɨgabɨm ak, tap tay okok mɨdupsek agem, agɨnɨgabɨm tek gɨnɨgab agak.17.20-21 Bɨ gos nɨgep ogɨnap, gos kɨli anɨgɨl mɨdeb, takaw ogɨnap sek mɨdeb. Takaw anɨb ak anɨb agup, Pen kɨcheki abaŋ lup anɨb ak, yokɨp agyokep tek ma lup agup. Tap mɨdup kelɨgɨl God nop agnɨg mɨdɨl nɨm, agyokɨpal agup.
